I'm building a chart that includes every coin, for its entire trading history. This is the earliest snapshot from Coinmarketcap; on Apr 2013, 7 coins listed.   Anyone have earlier market data specifically for TRC and DVC? #DataArchaeology  (I already have BTC LTC NVC NMC PPC)  https://t.co/Ncjn99iiZA

$LTC / $BTC  The line drawn is at .0068.  Litecoin has spent 1,681 days above the line (83% of its life) and 353 days below it (17%).  Every time it has hit or dipped below the line, it has recovered with at least a 200% gain.  It's probably not a bad time to start scaling in.  https://t.co/MC9NdVwISi
